data.title: Woodburn Private Jet and Air Charter Flights
data.meta_description: Monarch Air Group offers plenty of private jet charter options to and from Woodburn, Oregon, United States.
data.text:
Monarch Air Group provides private air charter in Woodburn, Oregon. Our clients benefit from top-notch service, unrelenting dedication to safety, wide selection of aircraft, and years of experience in chartering private jets. To obtain a free quote, please use our online quoting tool provided below, or call toll-free 1-877-281-3051

Charter a private jet in Woodburn, OR:

About Woodburn, Oregon, United States

Monarch Air Group offers plenty of private jet charter options to and from Woodburn, Oregon, United States.

Situated between Salem and Portland, Woodburn is a spectacular city in Marion County, with endless opportunities – be it business or entertainment. It is part of the Salem Metropolitan Area, with an estimated population of about 24,395 residents.

Nestled in the northern portion of the Willamette Valley, Woodburn provides fascinating landscape and abundant outdoor activities. The most notable places of interest include the World’s Berry Center Museum, Willamette Ballet Academy, La Fiesta Mexicana, and more.

Portland International Airport is the closest major airport to Woodburn, which is located 47 miles from the city center and serves both international and domestic flights.
